bow: my baby is weeks old and cries more like yells for almost hours day the cries seem inconsolable it been going on for nearly week and we re both exhausted and out of ideas before anything she feeds very well every hour if feed her anytime she wants she attached to me 24h day and ends up just comfort sucking and hurting me her diaper is clean and she adequately dressed no fever either here are few things we tried if you see something we haven tried please comment rocking her caressing her talking in smooth voice singing walking inside walking outside bath massage belly massage cycling legs colicky hold upright position laying on me skin to skin contact popping her in the sling white noise also know that crying is expected to peak at weeks but hours of inconsolable cries seems lot she burns so much energy in these bursts is this something you ve seen too how long did it last are you sure she getting enough to eat know it hard to tell when bf ing what are her poops like every hour seems like bit much she shiuld be going at least hrs between feeds think have lo youngest is weeks in hindsight was semi starving my first oops poop and pee normal any rashes around her mouth knees elbows or belly does she like being tightly swaddled or hate it you are close to if not through the worst names for this include purple crying colic the arsenic hour look up the fourth trimester it hard you are doing everything you can sometimes babies just cry because life is really hard that said how is her weight gain is she peeing often does she feel better after she farts ours had hard time as his digestive system ramped up gas simethicone drops helped cluster feeding is normal but not if there are lot of pees poops with it get right up in our baby face with the shushing what kind of sling do you have is she tucked up right next to your heart know hours seems like lot and that she ca possibly be asleep enough ours woke up from am to am every night for like weeks from weeks then he just stopped one night he slept through the night and woke up because thought he was dead it gets better just wait for that first smile it ll bring tears to your eyes she used to like being swaddled but not since these cries have started she just grunts and wakes herself fighting her way out of the burrito no rashes lots of pee and regular poops she doesn show any signs that she wants needs more was doing on request before but if do that now she attached to me all day she produces up to diapers day healthy yellow poops big enough to fill if not overflow her diapers weeks was when it stopped for you when should start worrying isn there any concern about her not gaining weight because she burning so much energy on all that crying my daughter did this every night for months we took her to the doctor worried she was getting enough breast milk and they told me her weight was going up so it could be that ended up exclusively pumping for 11 months because was so paranoid the doctors were wrong about her food intake we took her to the er in the middle of the night more times than can count my daughter is about to turn four and still have lingering ptsd and resentment from those days seeing therapist to work through those issues wish had advice for you but honestly around months she stopped crying for hours night and started sleeping my pediatrician said some kids are just like that and just said she had colic we tried gas drops and the windy you can buy on amazon to relieve gas and giving her more tummy time as she got older but none of that helped long term you ll get through this it may be hard difficult for now if you have family friends to turn to do that you re going to need to get away sometimes or else you ll go insane just keep chanting to yourself this too shall pass and it will definitely colic hows her poop any eczema take her to the doctor milk allergies or any diet allergy crop up at weeks right when you said this started ask them to check her poop bring poop diaper to then for blood you wont see it but their test can rule it out just went through this in the mean time cut diary and other common allergebs like soy from your diet good luck it will get better sorry your baby is going through this ps she could have overactive reflux too comfort nursing is common with that you can go have an lactation consultant check her weight after feed to make sure shes getting enough milk it stopped only after months will definitely need to get away from it if it keeps going for that long my heart goes out to you and your bub truly my little one was the same so understand how exhausted you feel it felt like nothing could comfort or soothe her if could hug you and offer you nap 100 would hate myself little for the comment about to make because hated people asking me this but it ended up being the crux of what was going on for my daughter how is your supply going my little one seemed to feed well and often too she would have been at my breast 24 hours straight if it were possible she had lots of wet nappies however it still was enough for her she needed more worked really hard on getting my supply up pumping fenugreek supplements lactation cookies domperidone prescription increased water and caloric intake but also had to resort to comp feeds with formula in the end definitely am not jumping straight to that conclusion for you but am wanting to be honest about my experience so share all this with kindness and not criticism lt the only other thing that we found helpful was being in dim room holding her facing our chest and jiggling her up and down quite intensely while supporting her neck and patting her back whilst sssh ing loudly know that whole lot of sensory input seems crazy right it sure was workout and it sometimes took upwards of 20 30 minutes to get her to fully calm but if we stopped at any point during the 20 30 minutes she start screaming again the poor little thing keep in mind that although it feels like you re not able to help even the fact that you re being with her all this time while she not feeling great is actually really helping her you re teaching her that when she got big messy feeling she not alone with it you re right there with her trying to figure it out she is learning that you are reliable trustworthy and safe you re laying the groundwork for her to feel secure with you when my daughter seemed inconsolable for hours kept the phrase being with in my mind thinking about it this way saved my sanity poop totally normal yellow with little seeds good amount was checked by midwife no eczema already don eat dairy or soy what would blood in poop mean we did get her intake checked at the birthing center and all was good reflux seemed likely to me but it just guess what would other symptoms be have you had her month appointment believe me doctors will let you know if she is gaining enough weight have 4th percentile baby so know dehydration shows up as not enough diapers or sunken eyes and soft spots if you see that you need to call your doctor right then if you are just generally concerned you can always call your doctor and talk to them they are there to answer your questions you are bothering them you can always ask for weight check ca tell you how much she burning by crying but recommended weight gain is oz day at that age but yes my son got past it around weeks and then it was steady improvement have you tried baby swing both of my kids loved swinging when nothing else seemed to be working aww thanks my supply was too high for her until this week green liquid poop as she got only foremilk would dump bit of milk before breastfeeding her so she would get the hindmilk stopped that on sunday and let her feed through still ll check if she still drinking enough the only thing comforting her seems to be novelty and only for half minute how long did this phase last for you and your little one see if you can find the happiest baby on the block videos it was the best calming technique ve used also did notice swaddling on the list just thought good luck don have one month appointment it weeks and weeks here ll go get her weight checked again it self service at the clinic don have swing what kind do you have recommand like to try ll look it up thanks swaddling doesn work anymore she grunts and fights her way out of it and ends up crying that darn foremilk got around that by letting her feed times in row from the same breast so that way she got the satisfaction of the fast flowing foremilk but then got all the rich hindmilk as well she got annoyed having to work harder for it but she was definitely more satisfied novelty was the same for my babe babies are very clever they know when we re trying to distract them from their feelings and they wo have it my daughter was much easier to soothe by weeks the screaming calmed lot and she was sleeping longer stretches through the night 6ish hours or so hang in there inherited an old style graco swing but think they do make that version anymore ca recommend any in particular but try to get one that will keep swinging without assistance battery or adapter yeah we still had some bouts of two four hours of crying during months and she started at about weeks old so almost months of crying for about hours night and then suddenly she slept we thought she was dead and was so traumatized developed insomnia and anxiety and stayed up watching her in her crib to make sure she was still alive roughest experience of my entire life there nothing like your child crying inconsolably for that long and you re helpless know you said she fights the swaddle few young babies do hate being unswaddled but would say 95 still need strong swaddle to sleep the grunting could also be gas have you tried zip or velcro style swaddle that she ca get out of rather than blanket for my son we used the miracle wrap and for my daughter the ergo pouch woombie good feed burp swaddle and bouncing on yoga ball in dark room with white noise always worked eventually if baby was unsettled and overtired would put on headphones and watch netflix and bounce until baby settled tried your strategy to get to the hindmilk but my mini human was not cooperating she would detach and then pull her head really far back with the cutest of ever so closed mouth she would not nurse after that haha thanks for the info weeks seems so far away right now hope it gets better fast we re so exhausted ok thanks will look for used one she really only is happy when she in our arms do swings work for clingy babies too anyway ll see ll have to look up those swaddle bags think what the problem is is that she realizes we re not holding her anymore and then realizes she in burrito she fights it and gets angry and wants our arms haven tried the bouncing balls can try that too definitely do headphones or corded ear plugs when she inconsolable otherwise be crazy already oh my god that sounds tiring and terrifying it good to know that other people went through it and survived it really appreciate you sharing your experience it helps me at least envision how long it might last and how this might play on my feelings that how old my daughter was when cluster feeding started in my case all she wanted was to keep breastfeeding and the crying stopped it took me while to figure it out and tried everything else not fun try gerber soothe colic drops the only thing that helped my daughter she was inconsolable for 12+ hours day within weeks of starting the drops she was down to an hour day of crying sometimes less they saved us my son was the same and honestly do know how we survived it it will get better have you read the wonder weeks ve no idea if it true but it did give me something to hang onto friend of mine baby was similar and she found that putting her hands over his ears soothed him as if he was desperate for someone to shut that racket of the crying baby up made me laugh anyway hang on in there she did cluster feed before but this seems different she will sometimes show no interest in breastfeeding and just keep yelling for example she will lick the boob and avoid taking the nipple also there are no hunger cues it straight to yelling and kicking and jittery movement it just doesn look like hunger ll give it try anyway more feedings thanks ok looking that up thanks love the idea of the baby being annoyed at her own noise will try that out for sure haha if nothing else it helps you retain sense of humour hang on in there promise it gets better blood in poop is an allergy wo be noticeable to naked eye also if her poop is slimy jello like means there mucous another gatro distress sign reflux can be silent baby can make squeaking wheezing noises hiccups can sound wet she ll look uncomfortable or upset when hiccuping sometimes oh sour smelling breath is sure sign of silent reflux when she spits up she ll cry ca think of any other signs atm but you can probably look around for more info on that the swing worked for my daughter during this stage too it was the only thing that gave me 30 minutes of no crying during witching hour it sounds bad but the little weak swings we used for our first did nothing at all the mamaroo was useless the graco duetconnect worked well because it had battery operated vibration in the seat even when she was screaming at the top of her lungs she could resist fall asleep or at least settling down with the combination of the vibrating seat speed swing look for something with the vibration and stock up on batteries tried not to keep her in it for more than an hour every day half hour in the morning and half hour at night but sometimes it was the only thing helping me with my sanity the poop texture is hard for me to tell don have any comparison what you describe for reflux sounds exactly like her she does spit up bubbles of saliva and she gets really angry the squeeking wheezing and wet hiccups is gain and nappy output know it small comfort but if these two things are good it will get better my lo is weeks and while we re still having problems where think there something major happening but time which is so infuriating know as still in thick of it hang on there we can do it xx my daughter did this too about weeks then it subsided know that if you get overwhelmed it is ok to set your baby hurts so breastfeed if she asks cues and wait until she either detaches herself or until she looses the latch then wait 10 minutes and watch for cues if she hungry again we go again then won while she in crisis are you in the us if so walgreens and amazon and perhaps some other pharmacies sell something called colon ez detect which are strips that check for occult microscopic blood used these to keep check on both my allergic children swipe some poo on the strip if it turns into big blue plus sign you know there blood in it whether you can see red in the stool or not they re bit less think it sounds like silent reflux based on your other replies in this thread mine is 4w and exhibited some of the same symptoms doctor prescribed zantac and crying stopped after almost day we still get witching hour night but not all day or night inconsolable crying ve thought about that before and ve been told to wait until the weeks mark before trying paci what do you think about nipple confusion did you experience this abridged version during nursing there is foremilk which has certain chemistry and comes out first and hindmilk which is richer and comes out last too much foremilk leads to reflux and digestive troubles meanwhile forceful letdown is uncomfortable for baby and leads to frustration so she nurses often but not long never really getting to the hindmilk which is the good stuff expressing before nursing so baby gets to the hindmilk also eases the forceful letdown and treating engorgement oversupply helps cold raw cabbage leaves oddly enough help ease engorgement in canada will look that up thanks thanks for your input we had this problem he had silent reflux zantac changed our world was told the same thing and tried to wait really did when he was about 3ish with dairy including broken down or baked in can cause reaction dairy hides in lot of products my son was also very tough as newborn constantly crying terrible gas never content eczema diaper rash microscopic blood in his stool he was diagnosed with cows milk protein intolerance at weeks had to cut 100 of dairy and soy in all forms we don know for sure if he is soy intolerant but as per his
